name: Persona 5 | Kawakami Sadayo |
description:
About

Images generated with AOM3 Model

  • Trained with default settings of Kohya fast LoRA trainer

  • Recommended weight: 0.6-0.8

  • Default look: short, messy hair (no modifying tags: ex. Maid)

Recommended LoRAs to add:

Their LoRas carry the style :)

  • Persona 5 Portrait LoRA / LoCon

  • Persona / Catherine (Soejima Shigenori) Style LoRA

  • Persona 5 Hard

modelVersions.name: v01
modelVersions.description:
• Can do multiple outfits: the maid outfit + striped long sleeve outfit

  • Can do short hair + twintails

  • Tags are not pruned.

Known issues:

  • There may be a badge that shows up on her clothing.

  • It's a little difficult to get denim skirt/shorts.
